thread.title: BRIEF-Nu Skin Enterprises Enters Into A Credit Agreement That Provides For A $400 Million Term Loan Facility

title: BRIEF-Nu Skin Enterprises Enters Into A Credit Agreement That Provides For A $400 Million Term Loan Facility

organizations.name: min read    nu skin enterprises inc
million term loan facility reuters staff

text:
April 23, 2018 / 8:31 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Nu Skin Enterprises Enters Into A Credit Agreement That Provides For A $400 Million Term Loan Facility Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  NU Skin Enterprises Inc: 
* NU SKIN ENTERPRISES SAYS ON APRIL 18, 2018 CO ENTERED INTO A CREDIT AGREEMENT THAT PROVIDES FOR A $400 MILLION TERM LOAN FACILITY - SEC FILING 
* NU SKIN ENTERPRISES INC - CREDIT AGREEMENT ALSO PROVIDES FOR A $350 MILLION REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY EACH WITH A TERM OF FIVE YEARS Source text for Eikon: ( bit.ly/2HmJK6B ) Further company coverage:
